author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
HLT menu updates on top of what already merged in CMSSW_7_6_X, i.e.
- Remove HBHE Noise Cleaner from all paths in the menu, and rename a few paths accordingly
- Adjust the threshold to the MET200 path, so that it is really set at 200 GeV, as it should
- Split Stream A into three Physics streams, as it was done already for the 50ns menu
- Rename DQMOffline stream as HLTMonitor
title: HLT updates for the 25ns menu - 76X
